original_text:
Thus says the Lord:
“What wrong did your fathers find in me
    that they went far from me,
and went after worthlessness, and became worthless?
korean_text: 나 여호와가 이와 같이 말하노라 너희 조상들이 내게서 무슨 불의함을 보았기에 나를 멀리 하고 가서 헛된 것을 따라 헛되이 행하였느냐

sentences.original_text: What wrong did your fathers find in me
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 조상들이 내게서 무슨 불의를 발견했기에

sentences.original_text: that they went far from me,
